definition: to hold an office or post

sentences.english: Her husband works in the human resources department of a state-owned enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 而她的丈夫則供職於一家國有企業的人力資源部門。

sentences.english: He is working in China Children's Press&Publication Group.
sentences.chinese: 供職於中國少年兒童新聞出版總社。

sentences.english: He works at the Kentucky Center for reproductive Medicine and Invitro Fertilization.
sentences.chinese: 他現在供職於肯塔基生殖保健品和體外受精研究中心。

sentences.english: He serves on a city-sponsored Diversity Task Force set up by Mayor Doyle.
sentences.chinese: 他在道爾市長設立由市府贊助的多元特別工作組供職。

sentences.english: I met an English-speaking official in the Trade Bureau in Mukden.
sentences.chinese: 我遇到一位在瀋陽貿易局供職的會說英語的官員。

sentences.english: Gelbart's mother worked at a bank.
sentences.chinese: Gelbart的母親在一家銀行供職。

sentences.english: I once worked for a company where they gave five-year rewards for employees.
sentences.chinese: 我曾經供職於一個公司，工作給員工一個五年的獎勵。

sentences.english: He must study hard and store up knowledge so in order to why serve his (the) country in the future.
sentences.chinese: 他必需用功讀書並積儲學問以便未來供職國度。

sentences.english: Presently serves in Weihai Vocational College.
sentences.chinese: 現供職於威海職業學院。

sentences.english: There were other cameramen in the army shipping group and also at the newspaper as well.
sentences.chinese: 軍隊航運部門也有其他的攝影師，他們也供職於報社。

sentences.english: Mountain peaks of the Seventy, running Lotus worked best.

sentences.english: Its chief executive, Qin Dazhong, was also previously at Li Ning.

sentences.english: He operated in an American company.
sentences.chinese: 他在一家美國公司供職。

sentences.english: Working in officialdom creates a pressure-cooker atmosphere, the  respondents said.
sentences.chinese: 受調查者們說，在官場供職猶如置身高壓鍋。

sentences.english: Now you are working for Sanjiang Company, aren't you?
sentences.chinese: 您現在供職於三江公司，是嗎？
